title: FIFA Gate Soccer Scandal
subtitle: Visualization showcasing global corruption schemes via money flows between FIFA officials and conspirators.
detail: This force graph visualization outlines 12 different schemes, as laid out by the FBI in 2015. The **Icons** represent each _Actor_ involved, **Colors** denote _Connection_ types, and **Line Type** defines actual vs planned _Payoffs_. Featured on USA Today's [Fields of Green](http://thefieldsofgreen.com/2015/06/19/fifa-infographic/). Collaborative project with [Rook Campbell, PhD](https://uscpublicdiplomacy.org/users/rook_campbell) - USC Center on Public Diplomacy.

title: Tracking Live Music Venues
subtitle: Los Angeles live music venue density map.
detail: A visualization of 210 live music events taking place at 87 different venues across Los Angeles, over the course of a week. Data scraped from Ticketfly.
